alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 10:25AM CDT until April 19 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1024 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Five Points, or 8 miles west of Dubuque, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dubuque and Durango around 1030 AM CDT. Sherrill, Sageville, Edmore and Finley`s Landing Park around 1035 AM CDT. Mud Lake Park and Lock And Dam 11 around 1040 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
